summary.span: 包含从 中的工作流实例中提取的数据的筛选条件。

span.span: Contains filter criteria for data extracted from a workflow instance in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 指定从工作流中提取的一段数据的值。A specifies the value of a piece of data extracted from a workflow. 它用于约束 对象集（由 所使用跟踪数据库的查询中的 返回）。It is used to constrain the set of objects returned by in a query of the tracking data base used by a . 您可以将 对象添加到 ，以指定将 对象集（由 返回）约束为处理指定已提取数据集的那些对象。You can add objects to to specify that the set of objects returned by be constrained to those possessing the specified set of extracted data.
